Angels In the Sky

Introduction

AIS for a description of the game and
the game interface, and an introduction.

An extraterrestrial force written in the ancient scroll has arrived on Earth.
This alien race feeds on the life force of planets, and it has come to Earth,
drawn by its wealth of vital energies.
If this hostile race is left to have its way with Earth, the planet will lose its light,
and soon be reduced to dust.
Of all the people living on Earth, you're the only one who was able to learn the alien
race's technology recorded in the ancient scroll.
You're Earth’s very last hope in defending against the aliens.
Use the alien technology against its owners and protect Earth.

Lobby interface

  • 01. The Lobby screen consists of Mission, Garage, and Achievements.

    In the Mission screen, select an act and press Start to play it. Only Grand Canyon is available for now, but soon more worlds will be updated.
  • 02.Touch a weapon to buy or equip it.

    In the Garage screen, you can check your ship and weapons.

    Player ships can be upgraded up to Level 3, and it is best that you repair them and replenish their HP immediately after battle. Touch Primary L, Primary R, or Special to buy or equip the weapon.
  • 03. Achievements display the information of your major achievements and Cash rewards.

    Your achievements are converted to ranking points and used for displaying your rank in the Game Center.

In-game interface

  • 1. Touch or hold down on a weapon to attack your enemies.
    • – Touch Primary L to attack an enemy marked with --.
    • – Touch Primary R to attack an enemy marked with --. To use the basic weapon, the Void Cannon, hold down on the icon until the gauge is filled, then release your finger to launch an attack.
  • 2. Escape the combat zone before your HP reaches 0.
    • – When your ship's Shield and HP reach 0, the game is over.
    • – The objective of each act is to escape the combat zone safely. You can check the remaining distance until the exit point.
    • – When the O. R. A. System is activated during combat, touch it to instantly accelerate your speed.
